name: Lightcube Platformer
description:
A little Lightcube has been trapped inside the cave. Luckily, he is always shining and has an ability to light up dark areas. But unfortunately he can't find the way out of this cave. Help a little Lightcube get out of here by finding the exit, jump past the pits and avoid the obstacles.

◀️ Control ▶️
Left, Right Arrow key = Move
Up Arrow key = Jump

Not my game. All credit goes to Firstject
